load-comic-files.effect-success-detail: Found {count, plural, =1{one comic file} other{# comic files}}.
load-comic-files.effect-failure-detail: Failed to find any comic files.

import-comic-files.page-title: Import Comics: {selected, plural, =1{One} other{#}} Of {count, plural, =1{One Comic} other{# Comics}} Selected

tooltip.ignore-metadata-on: Will import any metadata in the comic files.
tooltip.ignore-metadata-off: Will not import any metadata in the comic files.
tooltip.delete-blocked-pages-on: Will mark blocked pages  for deletion.
tooltip.delete-blocked-pages-off: Will not mark blocked pages for deletion.
tooltip.select-all: Select all comic files for import.
tooltip.start-import: Start importing the selected comic files.

import-comic-files.confirm-start-message: Are you sure you want to import the {count, plural, =1{one comic} other{# comic files}} into the library?

send-comic-files.effect-success-detail: Submitted {count, plural, =1{one comic file} other{# comic files}} for import.
send-comic-files.effect-failure-detail: Failed to send comic files for import.

undo-changes.title: Undo Changes
undo-changes.message: Are you sure you want to undo changes to this comic?

hint.required-for-scraping: This value is required for scraping...

text.file-entries: There {count, plural, =1{is one file} other{are # files}} in this archive.

tooltip.go-to-next-comic: Go to the next comic in this series...
tooltip.go-to-previous-comic: Go to the previous comic in this series...
